ingredients.item: 1 pork fillet, cut into cubes, approx 450g

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the pork to brown. Add the onion and pepper and fry for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the buckwheat, stock and mustard, cover and simmer gently for 15 minutes.
Stir in the courgettes and cook for a further 5 minutes. Season to taste.
